showZero.desc_read_: Whether to show badge when count is zero

dot.desc_read_: Whether to display a red dot instead of count

status.desc_read_: Set Badge as a status dot

text.desc_read_: If status is set, text sets the display text of the status dot

offset.desc_read_: set offset of the badge dot, like[x, y]

title.desc_read_: Text to show when hovering over the badge
